tasks.task: Enroll in the beginner farmers training program at the University of Kentucky.
subtasks: Research the University of Kentucky's beginner farmers training program.
Visually confirm the launch of the training program with the Pike County Cooperative Extension Service.
Understand the program's target audience, which includes new farmers, veterans, and others interested in commercial farming.
Note the program's focus on hands-on workshops for marketing, vegetable and small fruit production, and livestock.
Learn about the one-on-one mentoring sessions offered for feedback.
Verify the application deadline of February 1st.
Assess eligibility requirements for the training program.
Attend workshops on various aspects of commercial farming.
Engage in field trips and mentorship opportunities.
Receive one-on-one business marketing and production training.
Network with other farmers and mentors.
Submit the application by the specified deadline.
Prepare for a commitment to the program’s activities and participation.
